name: guardian-of-env
description: ensure .env files are all the same
author: hermeslin <mercury.iwork@gmail.com>

scripts.test: yarn lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=./src mocha --timeout 5000 --require @babel/register
scripts.test:coverage: yarn lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc yarn test
scripts.test:coverage:html: yarn lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html yarn test
scripts.build: yarn test && cross-env BABEL_ENV=production babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.build:minify: yarn test && cross-env BABEL_ENV=production babel src --out-dir lib --presets minify
scripts.pre-publish: yarn clean && yarn lint && yarn build
